title: Stevie Wonder - A Night Of Wonder 1995 BBC NTSC
description:
Another gem from the bootleg archive.

Please enjoy, share with friends and seed :)


Stevie Wonder - 1995-??-?? BBC Studios - A Night Of Wonder (NTSC)

This is a really interesting disc I found in a used clearance bin at my local Half Price Books. It's a cheaply packaged bootleg disguised as a legit dvd and somehow "New Media/highline Play" and several other nonlegible "labels" are on it. No affiliation to Motown or Universal mentioned anywhere. In fact while it gives a NY company address, It has a chinese product stamp on it. Fakety fakety fake!

This was a show Stevie did for BBC Studios in 1995 when his Conversation Peace album was released. I have been having a hard time finding the exact date it was recorded or aired in 1995 (help anyone?)

In true bootleg fashion, It has a gawdy Microsoft Word circa 1995-esque cover, and the aspect ratio was wrong. I was able to correct the files back to their original 4:3 setting, as they just had the wrong settings in the IFO files.

It claims 5.1 Surround on the box but my guess is the "5.1" track is a fake. Anyways - hope you all enjoy, as it is a great show.

Approx 55 min. - 4:3 Aspect Ratio - Single Layer NTSC - Studio and "5.1" Audio tracks.

Tracklist

Master Blaster
Higher Ground
Sensuous Whisper
My Cheri Amor
Signed, Sealed, Delivered I'm Yours
Sir Duke / I Wish
You Are The Sunshine Of My Life
Supersition
I Just Called To Say I Love You
Cold Chill
Do I Do
